name: RiotZ
description: This game is about the harsh survival in the world of zombies. You have to kill zombies, decorate the character and get respect from others!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32-bit Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 mb nVidia GeForce 8800 GT or Radeon HD 3870 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
